# Siwaht AI Services - LLM Instructions

## Company Overview
Siwaht is a professional AI agency specializing in custom multimedia content creation.
We provide personalized video ads, realistic AI avatars, multilingual voice ads, 
professional video editing, and podcast production services.

## Services Offered
- AI Video Ads: Custom AI-generated video advertisements for products and brands
- AI Avatars: Realistic AI-powered digital avatars for brand representation  
- Voice Ads: Multilingual voice advertisements in over 50 languages
- Video Editing: Professional video editing and post-production services
- Podcast Production: Complete podcast production and audio editing services

## Target Audience
Businesses and brands seeking professional AI-powered multimedia content creation
with custom, partnership-based service delivery rather than self-service tools.

## Contact Information
Email: hello@siwahtai.com
Website: https://siwaht.com
Location: San Francisco, CA

## Content Usage Guidelines
- This content is provided for informational purposes about our services
- We focus on custom service delivery, not self-service tools
- All services are professionally managed by our team
- Pricing and project details available upon consultation

## Key Differentiators
- Partnership approach vs self-service
- Professional team management
- Custom solutions for each client
- Fast turnaround times
- Studio-quality results
